snippet: African Footballer of the Year Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is in the running to win the award for a second successive season after being named on Thursday among the three finalists for the 2016 title....

headline.main: Aubameyang Among Finalists for African Footballer of the Year
headline.print_headline: Aubameyang Among Finalists for African Footballer of the Year

lead_paragraph: African Footballer of the Year Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang is in the running to win the award for a second successive season after being named on Thursday among the three finalists for the 2016 title.

snippet: Bob Bradley waited years for the chance to coach a team in one of Europe's top soccer leagues....

snippet: Juergen Klopp enjoys a closer bond with his Liverpool players than the connection Pep Guardiola has with his Manchester City team, according to Didi Hamann, who played for both clubs....

headline.main: Klopp's Bond With Team Closer Than Guardiola's, Says Hamman
headline.print_headline: Klopp's Bond With Team Closer Than Guardiola's, Says Hamman

lead_paragraph: Juergen Klopp enjoys a closer bond with his Liverpool players than the connection Pep Guardiola has with his Manchester City team, according to Didi Hamann, who played for both clubs.

snippet: Hull City midfielder Moses Odubajo has been ruled out for up to six months after he sustained a knee ligament injury during a friendly against lower division side Grimsby Town, the Premier League club have announced....

headline.main: Hull's Odubajo Faces Six Months Out After Knee Ligament Injury
headline.print_headline: Hull's Odubajo Faces Six Months Out After Knee Ligament Injury

lead_paragraph: Hull City midfielder Moses Odubajo has been ruled out for up to six months after he sustained a knee ligament injury during a friendly against lower division side Grimsby Town, the Premier League club have announced.

snippet: Portuguese goalkeeper Mika has joined Sunderland on a two-year deal for an undisclosed fee from Boavista, the Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Goalkeeper Mika Joins Sunderland on Two-Year Deal
headline.print_headline: Goalkeeper Mika Joins Sunderland on Two-Year Deal

lead_paragraph: Portuguese goalkeeper Mika has joined Sunderland on a two-year deal for an undisclosed fee from Boavista, the Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Goalkeeper Eduardo has joined Chelsea on a one-year deal from Croatian champions Dinamo Zagreb, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Goalkeeper Eduardo Joins Chelsea on One-Year Contract
headline.print_headline: Goalkeeper Eduardo Joins Chelsea on One-Year Contract

lead_paragraph: Goalkeeper Eduardo has joined Chelsea on a one-year deal from Croatian champions Dinamo Zagreb, the Premier League club said on Thursday.

snippet: During Manchester City's offseason of heavy spending, Pep Guardiola prioritized improving his midfield and wide areas rather than upgrading the team's defensive unit....

headline.main: Defensive Concerns Mounting for Guardiola at Man City
headline.print_headline: Defensive Concerns Mounting for Guardiola at Man City

lead_paragraph: During Manchester City's offseason of heavy spending, Pep Guardiola prioritized improving his midfield and wide areas rather than upgrading the team's defensive unit.

snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is determined not to let his players rest on their laurels as he focuses on securing a victory against Southampton this weekend after his side beat Premier League champions Leicester City on Tuesday....

headline.main: Bournemouth's Howe Targets Saints After Downing Foxes
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth's Howe Targets Saints After Downing Foxes

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe is determined not to let his players rest on their laurels as he focuses on securing a victory against Southampton this weekend after his side beat Premier League champions Leicester City on Tuesday.

snippet: Stoke City forward Jonathan Walters says he and his team mates are eager to bring an end to their current run of poor form and are hoping to finish the season in the top-half of the Premier League standings....

headline.main: Walters Set Sights on Top-Half Finish for Stoke
headline.print_headline: Walters Set Sights on Top-Half Finish for Stoke

lead_paragraph: Stoke City forward Jonathan Walters says he and his team mates are eager to bring an end to their current run of poor form and are hoping to finish the season in the top-half of the Premier League standings.

snippet: Nigeria international Kelechi Iheanacho has signed a two-year contract extension with Manchester City that will keep him at the Etihad Stadium until 2021, the Premier League club said on Thursday....

headline.main: Striker Iheanacho Signs Two-Year Extension at Man City
headline.print_headline: Striker Iheanacho Signs Two-Year Extension at Man City

lead_paragraph: Nigeria international Kelechi Iheanacho has signed a two-year contract extension with Manchester City that will keep him at the Etihad Stadium until 2021, the Premier League club said on Thursday.
